title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
Bring color, strategy, and elegance to your game nights with Azul, the award-winning family board game from Next Move. Designed by Michael Riesling, Azul invites 2–4 players to draft beautiful patterned tiles and craft stunning mosaics—turn by turn, choice by choice. Easy to learn yet deeply satisfying to master, it’s the perfect blend of accessible fun and smart strategy for families, friends, and casual gamers alike.

Why you’ll love it:
- Striking table presence: Vibrant, patterned tiles that look as good as they feel.
- High-quality components: Premium materials ensure a satisfying, durable play experience.
- Quick to learn, rich in strategy: Simple rules with meaningful decisions every round.
- Plays great at any count: Elegant gameplay for 2, 3, or 4 players.
- Timeless theme: Create captivating designs inspired by classic ceramic artistry.

Open the box, draft your tiles, and transform patterns into points as you outthink your rivals and complete the most beautiful mosaic. Azul is that rare game that delights first-time players and keeps seasoned gamers coming back for “just one more round.” Bring home Azul and make every game night a masterpiece.
